entries.meaning: Any action taken to counteract or correct another.
examples: We fear that this will be the beginning of a negative development of measures and countermeasures, at the end of which there will be no winner CNN-money, Why President Trump's obsession with German cars is misplaced, Jackie Wattles and Charles Riley, May 31, 2018

entries.meaning: (military, chiefly in the plural) Any of the devices and techniques used to impair the operational effectiveness of an enemy.
